title: Is JMC better for a B.Com hons or IPCW? - Quora

response.answer_text: Without taking any other chance go for jesus and mary college. It has good campus, infrastructure, teaching faculties etc. Ip is also good if you are getting. But here in my opinion u should go for jmc. Reason:- Convent college. These are good for your personality development.Discipline also matters.There u will explore yourself moreMore exposure would be there.Positive environment too.It’ s not that other co-eds are bad. Since u have asked about women specifically that’s why i would suggest jmc. If you are getting chance there. All the best.
Indraprastha college for Women is better than Janki Devi Memorial college for pursuing B. Com hons, in my opinion.
